snippet: Beneath the bombast from Iran’s leaders, strains on the economy from the sanctions showed further signs of getting worse, and Iranians appeared worried.
abstract: Iran’s top leaders display a public mix of bravado and defiance in the face of the West’s tightened antinuclear sanctions, using the impending 33rd anniversary of the Islamic Revolution to denounce the United States, the European Union and Israel as colonialist bullies; beneath the bombast, strains on Iran’s economy from the sanctions show further signs of deepening and a majority of Iranians are worried about financial pain from the penalties already imposed.
lead_paragraph: Beneath the bombast from Iran’s leaders, strains on the economy from the sanctions showed further signs of getting worse, and Iranians appeared worried.

headline.seo: Iran Defiant in Face of Sanctions
headline.main: Tough Words From Iran’s Leaders as Sanctions Cut Deep
headline.print_headline: Tough Words From Iran As Sanctions Cut Deep
